TopicTitle: Did the devs add asteroids, Or is all this talk of asteroids just mods?

Articles.Content:
Did the devs finally add asteroids or is all this talk of asteroids just mods?

Thanks for replies in advanced!
There was an update released for the game today that has many things in it, among them asteroids. More information is here.

Oh cool, I gotta update then... That's what happens when you stop playing PC for a while. Haha.

EDIT: Also wonder how you'd stop them this'll be great!
I think that technically speaking it's kind of a mod. But one that comes standard with the game and provided by the devs.
I can assure you that it's an official release by Squad. You can find more information about it here, as well as continue the discussion in that thread. Have a nice day
